name: Help! My memory is haunted!
description:
A spooktacular haul! ⊂(´･◡･⊂ )∘˚˳°

It is time to sort your collection of delicious sweets. But what is that? You seem to have picked up a few ghosts on the way and they have as much of a sweet tooth as you! Quickly, don’t let them steal your heard earned snacks!

A quick and simple memory game with a little twist.  Find matching pairs but beware the little ghosts. If you match with a ghost card, your sweet will transform. Not to imagine what will happen, if two ghosts get paired...

Up for some memory? Let's see how many sweets you can save!

Made in 48 hours by Vault Kid and Clive Black for UOL gamejam in Oldenburg 2022.
